actions.text: On agreeing to the Gibbs amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Gibbs to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Gibbs to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gibbs amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Transportation to study the methods States use to procure culvert and storm sewer materials and report the findings to the Transportation and Infrastructure Committee.
purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to require the Secretary of Transportation to study the methods State's use to procure culvert and storm sewer materials, and report their findings to the Transportation and Infrastructure Committee.
